example_sentence_italian: Voglio mettere il libro sul tavolo.
example_sentence_english: I want to put the book on the table.

example_sentence_italian: Sto mettendo il libro sul tavolo.
example_sentence_english: I am putting the book on the table.

notes: used with auxiliary 'avere' to form compound tenses
example_sentence_italian: La valigia è messa vicino al letto.
example_sentence_english: The suitcase is placed near the bed.

notes: used with auxiliary 'avere' to form compound tenses
example_sentence_italian: Le sedie sono messe in fila.
example_sentence_english: The chairs are placed in a row.

notes: used with auxiliary 'avere' to form compound tenses
example_sentence_italian: I libri sono messi sullo scaffale.
example_sentence_english: The books are placed on the shelf.

notes: used with auxiliary 'avere' to form compound tenses
example_sentence_italian: Il pacco è messo lì.
example_sentence_english: The package is placed there.

example_sentence_italian: Io metto il libro sul tavolo.
example_sentence_english: I put the book on the table.

example_sentence_italian: Tu metti le chiavi qui.
example_sentence_english: You put the keys here.

example_sentence_italian: Lui mette il piatto sul tavolo.
example_sentence_english: He puts the plate on the table.

example_sentence_italian: Noi mettiamo i piatti nella credenza.
example_sentence_english: We put the dishes in the cupboard.

example_sentence_italian: Voi mettete la roba fuori.
example_sentence_english: You (plural) put the stuff outside.

example_sentence_italian: Loro mettono i vestiti nell'armadio.
example_sentence_english: They put the clothes in the wardrobe.

translation_english: I was putting / I used to put
example_sentence_italian: Io mettevo i libri sul tavolo.
example_sentence_english: I used to put the books on the table.

example_sentence_italian: Tu mettevi sempre lo zucchero nel caffè.
example_sentence_english: You always used to put sugar in the coffee.

example_sentence_italian: Lui metteva il piatto a sinistra.
example_sentence_english: He was putting the plate on the left.

example_sentence_italian: Noi mettevamo le sedie intorno al tavolo.
example_sentence_english: We were putting the chairs around the table.

example_sentence_italian: Voi mettevate molta cura.
example_sentence_english: You (plural) used to take a lot of care.

example_sentence_italian: Loro mettevano tutto a posto.
example_sentence_english: They were putting everything in place.

notes: uses auxiliary 'avere' / past participle normally does not agree with subject
example_sentence_italian: Ho messo la borsa sul tavolo.
example_sentence_english: I have put the bag on the table.

notes: uses auxiliary 'avere' / past participle normally does not agree with subject
example_sentence_italian: Ho messo il libro sul tavolo.
example_sentence_english: I have put the book on the table.

notes: uses auxiliary 'avere' / past participle normally does not agree with subject
example_sentence_italian: Hai messo la tua borsa qui.
example_sentence_english: You have put your bag here.

notes: uses auxiliary 'avere' / past participle normally does not agree with subject
example_sentence_italian: Hai messo il bicchiere sul tavolo.
example_sentence_english: You have put the glass on the table.

notes: uses auxiliary 'avere' / past participle normally does not agree with subject; also 'you (formal)'
example_sentence_italian: Ha messo la cena nel frigorifero.
example_sentence_english: She has put the dinner in the fridge.

notes: uses auxiliary 'avere' / past participle normally does not agree with subject; also 'you (formal)'
example_sentence_italian: Ha messo il pacco in garage.
example_sentence_english: He has put the package in the garage.

notes: uses auxiliary 'avere' / past participle normally does not agree with subject
example_sentence_italian: Abbiamo messo le sedie in cucina.
example_sentence_english: We have put the chairs in the kitchen.

notes: uses auxiliary 'avere' / past participle normally does not agree with subject
example_sentence_italian: Abbiamo messo i libri sul tavolo.
example_sentence_english: We have put the books on the table.

notes: uses auxiliary 'avere' / past participle normally does not agree with subject
example_sentence_italian: Avete messo le chiavi nel cassetto.
example_sentence_english: You (plural) have put the keys in the drawer.

notes: uses auxiliary 'avere' / past participle normally does not agree with subject
example_sentence_italian: Avete messo i piatti sul tavolo.
example_sentence_english: You (plural) have put the plates on the table.

notes: uses auxiliary 'avere' / past participle normally does not agree with subject
example_sentence_italian: Hanno messo le scatole in soffitta.
example_sentence_english: They have put the boxes in the attic.

notes: uses auxiliary 'avere' / past participle normally does not agree with subject
example_sentence_italian: Hanno messo i vestiti nell'armadio.
